item.title: About
item.author: example@test.com (Mongoose Studios)
item.description:
Mongoose Studios is a creative venture trying to bring authenticity and serious long-form content back to the internet in the age of shorts with three different windows and an AI voiceover in them.

You can watch me code live on Twitch or on YouTube. You can also follow me on BlueSky where I mostly talk about painting tiny people, because all the software discussion has been swallowed by AI slop.

If you would like to work with Mongoose Studios on a project, please email us to discuss the specifics.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.author: example@test.com (Mongoose Studios)
item.description:
Famous first words, and important ones too. The traditional message to indicate that you have correctly configured your environment and can proceed with the project that currently has your attention.

How apropos, then, that this post exists to aid me in ensuring that all the machinery is in place and I can begin this particular endeavor.
